name: Rekongem Chamomilla Massage Milk 300 ml
descr:
Massage chamomile milk. Rekongem special chamomilla is a gel-emulsion massage chamomile milk designed for massage and self-massage for complexion spasm relaxation. Because of a suitable content of chamomile extract it has a regeneration, cleansing and antiperspiration effect. Massage chamomile milk is possible to use as a healing balm for complexion calming, for example after sunbathing. You can also use it for skin protection and regeneration and for complexion softening after bathing and against a dry complexion feeling.

Rekongem is a 3 in 1 massage product intended for rehabilitation, restorative and cosmetic massages and self-massages.Rekongem is a massage body lotion with a high massage slip with a minimal amount of fat phase and excellent dermatological properties with long-term effects. Its new formulation significantly increases skin hydration and leaves the skin soft and supple. Herbal extracts,active ingredients and perfume compositions take over the role of the smoothing lotion.

Dermatologicaly tested. Effect on the skin: Neutral pH-value.
 
Also available in 500 ml and 1000 ml version.
